backend/main.mo: Main actor defining all data types (Message, Worker, Material, CareerApplication, ArchitectProject, ContactRequest, UserProfile) and CRUD operations with admin authorization checks, including mixins for authorization and blob storage.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module that transforms old Message records (without personName) to new Message records (with personName field defaulted to empty string).
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting two high-confidence features: verifying admin dashboard data fetching without client-side filtering (REQ-3) and adding error boundaries with network diagnostics (REQ-4).
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Comprehensive summaries of all frontend files including routing, i18n, storage, validation, UI components, and admin dashboard functionality with proper backend integration.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with OKLCH color system defining light and dark theme variables for Work24 brand colors and admin dashboard styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with root div and module script loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root application component with TanStack Router setup defining all routes (home, services, materials, career, architect, submissions, contact, admin) wrapped in I18nProvider with onboarding check.
frontend/src/components/activity/Activit: Activity feed component displaying the 10 most recent messages from backend with error boundaries, loading states, network diagnostics, retry functionality, and empty state handling.

Message renderer that parses JSON-formatted activity messages, extracts source/origin, generates human-readable summaries for different submission types (career, architect, worker, material, contact), and displays with badges.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminDashb: Layout component for admin dashboard with responsive sidebar navigation (overview, messages, materials, workers sections), mobile menu sheet, and main content area.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminMessa: Renders admin messages with JSON parsing, structured field display with categorization (recognized vs. other fields), source badge extraction, and raw JSON toggle view.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminSumma: Displays four summary cards showing total counts for messages, workers, materials, and overall activity with error handling, loading states, and individual refetch buttons.
frontend/src/components/admin/MaterialsT: Admin tab displaying all materials in a table with columns for ID, name, category, location, and description, including refresh functionality.
frontend/src/components/admin/MessagesTa: Admin tab for viewing and deleting messages with sorting by timestamp, detailed error diagnostics, network error detection, delete confirmation dialog, and extensive console logging.
frontend/src/components/admin/WorkersTab: Admin tab displaying all workers in a table with columns for ID, name, skill, category, and location, including refresh functionality.
frontend/src/components/common/Work24Car: Reusable card wrapper component with hover effects, optional click handler, and scale animation on hover.
frontend/src/components/common/Work24For: Form field wrapper component with label, optional required indicator, error message display, and helper text support.
frontend/src/components/contact/ContactV: Dialog component for submitting contact requests with form validation for customer name, mobile number, and requirements. Handles submission via mutation hook and displays success/error toasts.
frontend/src/components/contact/Work24Of: Dialog component displaying Work24's official contact information (phone and email) with internationalization support. Shows contact details in a formatted panel with icons.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppFooter: Footer component displaying contact information, service description, quick navigation links, copyright notice, and attribution to caffeine.ai. Organized in a three-column grid layout.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppHeader: Header component with logo, desktop/mobile navigation menus, language switcher, and conditional admin link. Uses Sheet component for mobile menu and supports navigation to all main routes.
Layout wrapper component that combines AppHeader, main content area, and AppFooter in a flex column layout. Provides consistent page structure across the application.
frontend/src/components/materials/Materi: Card component displaying material information including image, name, category, location, and description. Includes a contact button that opens ContactViaWork24Dialog.
frontend/src/components/settings/Languag: Dropdown menu component for switching between English, Hindi, and Gujarati languages. Uses Globe icon and displays current language selection with i18n context.
frontend/src/components/workers/WorkerCa: Card component displaying worker profile with image, name, skill, location, and work gallery. Includes buttons to view work photos in a dialog and contact via Work24.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React Query hook for managing backend actor instances with Internet Identity authentication. Handles actor creation, authentication state, and invalidates dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context provider and hook for Internet Identity authentication, managing login state, identity storage, and AuthClient lifecycle. Provides login, logout, and status tracking functionality.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating backend data including admin messages, all messages, workers by category, and materials, with automatic refetching and query invalidation on mutations.
frontend/src/i18n/I18nProvider.tsx: Provides internationalization context and hooks for managing language state (en/hi/gu) and translating keys with fallback to English, persisting language preference to local storage.
frontend/src/i18n/translations.ts: Defines translation dictionaries for English, Hindi, and Gujarati covering navigation, onboarding, services, forms, and admin UI text keys.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for Work24 brand colors and admin dashboard themes in both light and dark modes using OKLCH color space.
frontend/src/lib/adminAllowlist.ts: Deprecated module that previously managed admin principal allowlists; now replaced by username/password authentication via adminSession.ts.
Provides utilities for safely parsing JSON messages, categorizing recognized fields, formatting values for display, and extracting human-readable message sources.
frontend/src/lib/adminSession.ts: Manages admin authentication session state in sessionStorage, providing functions to set, get, clear, and check admin login status with credentials.
frontend/src/lib/contactSubmissions.ts: Exports a React Query mutation hook for submitting contact forms (worker, material, career, architect) as JSON messages to the backend actor.
frontend/src/lib/formatIcTime.ts: Converts Internet Computer nanosecond timestamps (bigint) to human-readable date strings with locale formatting.
frontend/src/lib/localPreferences.ts: Manages localStorage for onboarding status, user name, language preference, and unique submitter ID generation and retrieval.
frontend/src/lib/materialsStorage.ts: Provides functions to get and add materials to localStorage with auto-generated unique IDs.
frontend/src/lib/officialContact.ts: Exports official Work24 contact phone number and email with formatted display strings and action links.
Defines allowed fields for worker and material data and provides sanitization functions to prevent exposure of sensitive contact information.
frontend/src/lib/servicesCatalog.ts: Defines the service catalog with IDs, translation keys, and icons for furniture, painting, fabrication, plumbing, electrical, and custom services.
frontend/src/lib/validation.ts: Provides validation functions for required fields and Indian mobile numbers with internationalized error messages.
frontend/src/lib/workersStorage.ts: Provides localStorage-based CRUD operations for Worker entities, including retrieval by service category and ID generation.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query, Internet Identity provider, and renders the root App component.
frontend/src/pages/Admin.tsx: Admin authentication and dashboard page with login form, session management, and tabs for overview, messages, materials, and workers.
frontend/src/pages/Architect.tsx: Form page for architects to submit project details including name, type, location, budget, message, and file uploads.
frontend/src/pages/Career.tsx: Career application form for workers to submit their name, mobile, skills, experience, and optional message.
frontend/src/pages/ContactUs.tsx: Static contact information page displaying official phone number, email, service description, and response time.
frontend/src/pages/HomeServices.tsx: Landing page with hero section and service category grid that navigates to individual service detail pages.
frontend/src/pages/Materials.tsx: Displays a grid of construction materials for sale fetched from backend using MaterialCard components.
frontend/src/pages/Onboarding.tsx: First-time user onboarding flow collecting name and language preference, then saving to local storage and redirecting to home.
frontend/src/pages/SellerMaterialSubmiss: Form page for sellers to submit construction materials for sale, including validation, image upload handling, and mutation to add materials to the backend.
frontend/src/pages/ServiceDetail.tsx: Service detail page that displays available workers for a specific service category, fetched from the backend using the useGetWorkersByCategory hook.
frontend/src/pages/WorkerSubmission.tsx: Registration form for workers to submit their profiles with skills, category selection, profile image, and work portfolio images, with validation and backend mutation.
frontend/src/types/materials.ts: TypeScript interface defining the Material type with properties for id, name, category, description, images, location, and submitter information.
frontend/src/types/workers.ts: TypeScript interface defining the Worker type with properties for id, name, skill, service category, images, location, and submitter information.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for extracting, storing, and managing URL parameters and session storage, supporting both standard and hash-based routing with persistence across navigation.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining custom theme extensions including color schemes (with admin-specific colors), container settings, border radius, shadows, and animations.
project_state.json: Project state file tracking a fix request for admin dashboard not showing cross-device activity data, with pending backend debugging and logging feature requests.
